bio:
Lami is a talented alchemist who lives in Morthal. She runs an alchemy shop called the Thaumaturgist's Hut. She lives with her husband Jorgen in their house across the bridge, near the sawmill where Jorgen works.
Lami is a Nord woman with fair hair and amber eyes. She normally wears a light-colored belted tunic. She speaks with a thick Nordic accent. She was originally taught the basics of alchemy from a temple healer who at the time was on a pilgrimage. When she has little else to do, Lami often mixes various ingredients together in hopes of discovering new potions, but usually goes through most of her ingredients stock in the process while having little success.
Morthal is the capital of Hjaalmarch hold. Hjaalmarch's terrain consists mostly of the Drajkmyr salt marshes in its northern half, and mountainous snowy tundra in its southern half. Morthal lies in between these two halves, with the River Hjaal running through the town.
Lami is friends with Alva, another woman in Morthal.
A young woman named Idgrod the Younger often comes into the shop and chats with Lami. Idgrod has a younger brother named Joric. Idgrod's mother is Idgrod Ravencrone (the jarl of Morthal) and her father Aslfur is the jarl's steward and husband. Idgrod the Younger will likely follow in her mother's footsteps one day to govern Morthal. Both Idgrods receive mysterious prophetic visions, accompanied by headaches.
A pair of Dunmer refugees (Milore Ienth and her husband Garyn) once lived with Lami and Jorgen for a short while, before they moved to the island of Solstheim. During this time, Lami taught Milore about alchemy. Lami is generally willing to sell Alchemy lessons to others. Angeline Morrard, an elderly Breton woman who lives in Solitude (the capital of Skyrim), refers anyone interested in learning alchemy to Lami.
When speaking to visitors, Lami's greetings usually focus on her store, or her alchemy work in general.
Quotes:
"If you need any alchemy supplies, I'll do my best to provide them. Assuming I haven't used them all up."
"Jorgen and I both work hard, all the time. Morthal is important to both of us."
"I don't get many customers, but that leaves me time to try things out. Experiment, I guess."
"Oh, do come in! I hope I have what you need."
If asked if she has trouble getting supplies way out here in Morthal: "No, no. Well, sometimes, but that's not the problem. I just often don't have much to do, so I tend to... I try things out. They don't usually work, but I try. Next thing I know, I've used up most of my stock."
If asked how long she's studied alchemy: "I picked up the trade when I was a girl. One of the temple healers staying here on a pilgrimage showed me the basics. She had a book with her, 'Song of the Alchemists', that I used to read over and over. I miss having a copy."
name: Lami
